"Twin Machineguns":
"“双機銃（ツインマシンガン）”は、
接近戦で真価を発揮する射撃武器です。

クラススキル“チェイントリガー”で
ヒット数に応じた強力なダメージを与えられます。"
"The Class Skill \"Chain Boost\" increases Twin Machineguns' attack speed, which helps to bring out their true power."

"The PA \"Bullet Rave\" allows you to deal a high amount of damage to a single enemy.

One use can land many hits against enemies, which makes it easy to rapidly increase your Chain count."
